    • About Chip Hodgkins


    Chip Hodgkins was born into business - his family has been doing business in central New York since the late 1800’s. Because his roots run deep here, Chip is passionate about helping the community develop and grow through real estate. He works tirelessly to improve his knowledge of the industry so he can service his clients at the highest possible level. When he’s not coming up with new marketing strategies, he’s traveling across the country attending conferences and events so he can learn from the best and contribute his own ideas to national real estate business systems.
